scripts.setup:client: cd client && npm install && npm run postinstall
scripts.setup:api: cd api && npm install && npm run build-compile && npm run build-config
scripts.setup:dev: npm run clear && npm run prepare && npm run setup:client && npm run setup:api
scripts.setup:dev-build-sdk: npm run clear && npm run setup:sdk-nova-local && npm run prepare && npm run setup:client && npm run setup:api
scripts.dev: concurrently 'cd api && npm run start-dev' 'cd client && npm run start'
scripts.format: concurrently 'cd api && npm run format' 'cd client && npm run format'
